keyMoments.title: Breed Reveals His Arena
keyMoments.description: Breed brings his captives to his massive underground arena, showcasing his base of operations.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Breed's domain and reveals his entertainment-focused villainy.
keyMoments.quote: Welcome to the greatest show on Earth!

keyMoments.title: Controls Luffy and Law
keyMoments.description: Breed successfully places his Peto Peto collars on both allied captains, demonstrating his devil fruit's power.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Breed can control even powerful pirates like Luffy and Law.
keyMoments.quote: Now you're both my pets! You'll do exactly as I command!

keyMoments.title: Breed's Ultimate Plan
keyMoments.description: Breed reveals his plan to use Caesar and SMILE fruits to transform all humans into controllable animals.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Breed's megalomaniacal ambitions and connects to the SMILE subplot.
keyMoments.quote: With Caesar's SMILE fruits, I'll turn every human into an animal under my control! A perfect world where I am king!

abilities.description: Creates green gel-like collars that allow complete control over any living creature that wears one.
Issues verbal commands to collared victims, forcing them to obey against their will.

reveals.information: Plans to use SMILE fruits to transform all humans into animals he can control

keyMoments.title: Returns with Armament Haki
keyMoments.description: The Kung-Fu Dugong from Alabasta reappears, now wielding Armament Haki and leading the Sea Animal Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Shows how Luffy's influence inspired the Dugong to pursue his own pirate dream and reach the New World.

keyMoments.title: Demonstrates Armament Haki
keyMoments.description: Uses Armament Haki to coat his flippers in black hardening while striking Luffy and Law.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that even minor characters from East Blue learned advanced techniques post-timeskip.

keyMoments.title: Strikes Through Arena Floor
keyMoments.description: Delivers a devastating Haki-enhanced punch that sends Luffy and Law crashing through the glass floor into water.
keyMoments.significance: Creates a life-threatening situation for the Devil Fruit users.

abilities.description: Coats flippers in black hardening to deliver devastating strikes.
Skilled martial artist trained in kung-fu combat techniques.

reveals.information: Learned Armament Haki during the timeskip
Formed the Sea Animal Pirates and reached the New World

keyMoments.title: Falls Under Breed's Control
keyMoments.description: Breed successfully places a collar on Luffy, taking control of his body against his will.
keyMoments.significance: Rare instance of Luffy being completely controlled by an enemy's power.
keyMoments.quote: My body... it's moving on its own!

keyMoments.title: Forced to Fight Law
keyMoments.description: Under Breed's control, Luffy attacks Law at full power in the arena, unable to stop himself.
keyMoments.significance: Tests the alliance as Luffy is forced to attack his ally.

name.japanese: トラファルガー・ロー

keyMoments.title: Pretends to Fight Luffy
keyMoments.description: Law appears to struggle against Luffy's controlled attacks while secretly wearing earplugs to avoid Breed's control.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Law's tactical intelligence and strategic thinking.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Earplug Strategy
keyMoments.description: Law reveals he was never under control because he used earplugs to prevent hearing Breed's commands.
keyMoments.significance: Provides the key weakness to defeating Breed's seemingly invincible power.
keyMoments.quote: I put in earplugs as soon as I saw the speakers. Can't obey commands I can't hear.

reveals.information: Discovered Breed's commands must be heard to take effect

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Under Breed's Control
keyMoments.description: Chopper remains collared and controlled by Breed, forced to watch Luffy and Law fight.
keyMoments.significance: Chopper's captivity motivates Luffy and Law to find a way to break free.

keyMoments.title: Target of Breed's Plan
keyMoments.description: Breed reveals he kidnapped Caesar to force him to mass-produce SMILE fruits for his world domination scheme.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes why Breed targeted the Straw Hat-Heart Pirate alliance.
